metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Wanderer is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Wanderer has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Mixolydian, G Major,  and E Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
